Class GeneratorController

java.lang.Object
com.password_generator.GeneratorController
public class GeneratorController extends Object
Class responsible for managing the application logic

    • ReadParameters

      private Object[] ReadParameters()
      Function that is responsible for reading the generation parameters from the graphical interface
      Returns:
      Object array with password generation parameters args[0] - boolean value: use numbers or not args[1] - boolean value: use upper case or not args[2] - boolean value: use special characters or not args[3] - boolean value: use Cyrillic characters or not args[4] - integer value: length of generating password args[5] - string value: string of elements user need to get in generated password
